name: Taiko-san Daijiro 2
description:
A rhythm action game using drums.

You can play the music file (.tja) of PC version "Taiko-san Jiro" and the music file (.osz) of "osu! taiko".
Please download and transfer the score file in Safari.

For details, please refer to the URL below.
https://server6.fc2-rentalserver.com/~chaos3/en/daijiro2_ios_help2/index.html

===========================
Thank you Specail

■ Sample song
Title "School Load"

Composition: Toshiyuki Azuma
http://azu-soundworks.net/

Music score creation: Million
